text: Cream {{fat}}, then gradually beat in {{sugar}} until smooth.
Add {{egg_component}} unbeaten (do not pre-whisk separately) and beat well.
Whisk together {{flour_base}}, {{baking_powder}}, and {{salt}}. Stir into the dough{{#if egg_component=whole}}, then add up to {{flour_adjust}} only if needed so the dough is not too dry{{/if}}.

{{#if fat=butter}}Cover and refrigerate the dough for about 1 hour to firm it before pressing. {{/if}}Fit a cookie press disk (number side up)—a cookie press is required—pack the press firmly, and press cookies onto an ungreased shiny cookie sheet.
